TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Context extends System.Object
.class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit Context extends System.Object

summary.span: 为驻留在其中的对象定义环境，在此环境中可以实施策略。

span.span: Defines an environment for the objects that are resident inside it and for which a policy can be enforced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文是一系列有序属性，这些属性定义了其中驻留的对象的环境。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects resident inside it. 上下文在对象的激活过程中创建，这些对象配置为需要某些自动服务，例如同步、事务、实时激活、安全等。Contexts get created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services, such as synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 多个对象可以存留在一个上下文内。Multiple objects can live inside a context. 类使用类的实例进行标记 ，该类提供使用规则。Classes are marked with an instance of the class, which provides the usage rules. 每次实例化新的对象时，.NET Framework 会找到兼容的或为对象创建类的新实例 。Whenever a new object is instantiated, the .NET Framework finds a compatible or creates a new instance of the class for the object. 将对象放置在上下文中后，它将一直保留在其中。Once an object is placed in a context, it stays in it for life. 可以绑定到上下文的类称为上下文绑定类。Classes that can be bound to a context are called context-bound classes. 从另一个上下文访问此类类时，将使用代理直接引用此类类。When accessed from another context, such classes are referenced directly by using a proxy. 从一个上下文中的对象到另一个上下文中对象的任何调用都将通过上下文代理，并受组合上下文属性强制执行的策略的影响。Any call from an object in one context to an object in another context will go through a context proxy and be affected by the policy that the combined context properties enforce. 通常，会根据类上的元数据属性选择新的对象的上下文。A new object's context is generally chosen based on meta-data attributes on the class. 此机制可通过自定义属性进行扩展。This mechanism is extensible through custom attributes. 这称为静态上下文属性，这些属性编译为类元数据。These are known as static-context properties, which are compiled into the class meta-data. 动态上下文属性 (也称为配置属性) 可以由管理员应用和配置。Dynamic-context properties (also known as configuration properties) can be applied and configured by administrators. 有关上下文的详细信息，请参阅 [边界：进程和应用程序域](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kt21t9h7(v=vs.100))。For more information on contexts, see [Boundaries: Processes and Application Domains](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kt21t9h7(v=vs.100)).

value.span: 命名空间的默认上下文。

span.span: The default context for the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未显式设置上下文的应用程序域中的每个线程都被视为在默认上下文中运行。Every thread in an application domain for which a context is not explicitly set is considered to be running in the default context.

summary.span: 执行另一上下文中的代码。

span.span: Executes code in another context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过传入委托，可以通过对其调用方法来完成回调 。A callback can be done by calling the method on it by passing in a delegate. 委托用于请求回调。The delegate is used to request a callback. 委托必须是 类类型。The delegate must be a class type.

summary.span: 清理非默认上下文的后备对象。

span.span: Cleans up the backing objects for the nondefault contexts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于默认上下文，在关闭类的过程中将清除后备对象 。For default contexts, backing objects are cleaned up during shut down of the class.

summary.span: 冻结上下文，使其无法从当前上下文添加或移除上下文属性。

span.span: Freezes the context, making it impossible to add or remove context properties from the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文冻结后，无法添加上下文属性。Context properties cannot be added after the context has been frozen.

span.span: The context is already frozen.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool RegisterDynamicProperty (System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty prop, ContextBoundObject obj, System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context ctx);

Public Shared Function RegisterDynamicProperty (prop As IDynamicProperty, obj As ContextBoundObject, ctx As Context) As Boolean

param.span: 为其注册 property 的上下文。

summary.span: 用远程处理服务注册实现 接口的动态属性。

span.span: Registers a dynamic property implementing the interface with the remoting service.

returns.span: 如果该属性已成功注册，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property was successfully registered; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据 `obj` 和 `ctx` ， `prop` 要求提供一个接收器，将其放置在远程调用路径中的某个位置。Based on `obj` and `ctx`, `prop` is asked to contribute a sink that is placed at some location in the path of remoting calls. 如果注册了多个属性，则将按任意顺序调用其接收器，以便在调用之间进行更改。If multiple properties are registered, their sinks will be called in an arbitrary order that can change between calls. 如果不 `obj` 是 `null` ，则在代理上进行的所有调用都将被截取。If `obj` is not `null`, and then if it is a proxy, all calls made on the proxy are intercepted. 否则，如果 `obj` 是实际对象，则会截获对该对象的所有调用。Otherwise, if `obj` is a real object, all calls on the object are intercepted. `ctx`参数必须是 `null` 。The `ctx` parameter must be `null`. 如果不 `ctx` 为 `null` ，则 `obj` 必须为， `null` 并且所有进入和退出上下文的调用都将被截取。If `ctx` is not `null`, `obj` must be `null` and all calls entering and leaving the context are intercepted. 如果 `ctx` 和 `obj` 都是 `null` ，则会截获进入和退出所有上下文的所有调用。If both `ctx` and `obj` are `null`, all calls entering and leaving all contexts are intercepted.

exception.span: 要么 或其名称为 ，要么它不是动态的（不实现 ）。

span.span: Either or its name is , or it is not dynamic (it does not implement ).

exception.span: 对象和上下文都已指定（ 和 都不为 ）。

span.span: Both an object as well as a context are specified (both and are not ).
